constituent: department, wheat, cereal, measuring cup, big dipper, The Plough, drop, ten, needle
heisigStory: Think here of the faculty or department you entered in university, using the elements: measuring cup . . . wheat.
koohiiStory1: The national DEPARTMENT of WHEATS and MEASURES. Get it? This one was hard until I came up with this.
koohiiStory2: Agriculture/astronomy departments...　　　　　　　　　　　　　　RTK2:　カ　科学　かがく (science).
